## Matrix4x4.getBottomPlane() method

Get the bottom clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBottomPlane(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The bottom clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that the matrix is an orthogonal projection matrix.
